# Grafico de caja

## Librerias necesarias

```{r, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(gcookbook)
library(reticulate)
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
```

## Grafico de caja en R

```{r, out.width="50%", out.height="50%", fig.align='center'}

cars %>% ggplot(aes(y=dist)) + 
    geom_boxplot()


```
